title: Archive a Reporter's Notes
description: After a major investigation is published, the reporter's notes and source documents must be securely archived for legal and historical purposes.

tasks.description: Gather all digital and physical notes, recordings, and documents related to the investigation.
Scan any physical documents to create digital copies.
tasks.expected_outcome: All materials are in a digital format.

tasks.description: Upload all digital files to a secure, access-controlled archival system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The sensitive source material is securely stored.
